author: cedricpri
body: This pull request introduces as new feature the possibility to keep the plots in a png format, along with the usual pdf. One directory is now created for each collection and filled with the corresponding png, while a directory called "PDF" is also created, gathering all the usual pdf that are being created. The change is transparent since it doesn't require any action from the user. Example of output: http://cprieels.web.cern.ch/cprieels/figures/NewPlots/MuonValidation/PNGOutput/
title: Output plots with png format
